question: Panthers vs. Maple Leafs
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for May 18 at 7:30PM ET:
If the Florida Panthers win, the market will resolve to “Panthers”.
If the Toronto Maple Leafs win, the market will resolve to “Maple Leafs”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: NBA Playoffs: Pacers vs. Knicks (To Advance)
description:
This market refers to the 2025 NBA Eastern Conference Finals matchup between the Indiana Pacers and New York Knicks.

If the Indiana Pacers advance to the 2025 NBA Finals, this market will resolve to “Pacers”.

If the New York Knicks advance to the 2025 NBA Finals, this market will resolve to “Knicks”.

If the series is canceled or postponed beyond July 20, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the NBA.

question: Astros vs. Rangers
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for May 18 at 1:05PM ET:
If the Houston Astros win, the market will resolve to “Astros”.
If the Texas Rangers win, the market will resolve to “Rangers”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

question: Will Vitality win the IEM Dallas tournament?
description:
This market will resolve according to the winner of the 2025 IEM Dallas Tournament.

If this tournament is postponed after July 28, 2025 (11:59 PM ET), canceled, or a winner has not been declared, this market will resolve to “Other”.

If multiple teams are declared winner, this market will resolve in favor of the team whose listed team name comes first alphabetically.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the HLTV (https://www.hltv.org/events/8037/iem-dallas-2025).

events.title: CS2: IEM Dallas
events.description:
This market will resolve according to the winner of the 2025 IEM Dallas CS2 Tournament.

If this tournament is postponed after July 28, 2025 (11:59 PM ET), canceled, or a winner has not been declared, this market will resolve to “Other”.

If multiple teams are declared winner, this market will resolve in favor of the team whose listed team name comes first alphabetically.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the HLTV (https://www.hltv.org/events/8037/iem-dallas-2025).

question: Comey jailed before July?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if former Director of the FBI James Comey serves any time in a federal, state, or local U.S. jail or prison between May 17 and June 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the U.S. Government, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: All New Orleans escapees captured by Friday?
description:
On Friday, May 16, ten inmates escaped from a jail in New Orleans. Three have since been captured, however seven remain at large. You can read more about that here: https://news.sky.com/story/eight-men-on-the-run-after-audacious-shawshank-escape-from-us-jail-13369323

This market will resolve to "Yes" if all of the remaining seven escapees are placed physically into the custody of any law enforcement agency by May 23, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be information from relevant government authorities.

question: Spread: Thunder (-8.5)
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for May 18 at 3:30PM ET:
If the Underdog, "Nuggets", wins the game or loses by the line or less, the market will resolve to the Underdog, "Nuggets".
Else, the market will resolve to the Favorite, "Thunder".
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
